attributes.action: Give a public a referendum of the reintroduction of capital punishment in uk
attributes.additional_details: Start by giving the people the decision in a national referendum on the reintroduction of the death penalty within UK law, its time the people decide, when it is beyond reasonable doubt, it should be considered.
attributes.background: Punishment for the most heinous crimes are not severe enough within the UK justice system, many other sentences are too short and prisons have become a place to pacify prisoners to serve their time rather than being a disciplined deterrent, a place they would not wish to return.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
